cloud.desc: We offer {{credit}} free computing credits to all registered users, no complex configuration required, ready to use out of the box, support unlimited conversation history and global cloud synchronization.
cloud.descOnMobile: We provide {{credit}} free computing credits for all registered users, ready to use without complex configuration.
cloud.title: Launch {{name}}

appLoading.failed: Sorry, the application initialization failed. Please check the details for troubleshooting.

autoGenerateTooltip: Auto-generate assistant description based on prompts
autoGenerateTooltipDisabled: Please enter a tooltip before using the autocomplete feature
branchingDisable: The 'Subtopic' feature is only available in the server version. If you need this feature, please switch to server deployment mode or use LobeChat Cloud.

error.desc: We apologize, an error occurred during the Pglite database initialization process. Please click the button to retry. If the error persists after multiple attempts, please <1>submit an issue</1>, and we will assist you as soon as possible.
error.detail: Error reason: [{{type}}] {{message}}. Details are as follows:
error.title: Database Initialization Failed

initing.error: An error occurred, please try again

modal.desc: Enable the PGlite client database to persistently store chat data in your browser and use advanced features like knowledge base.

knowledgeBase.desc: Build your personal knowledge base and easily start conversations with your assistant (coming soon)
knowledgeBase.title: Support for knowledge base conversations

localFirst.desc: Chat data is stored entirely in the browser, keeping your data always under your control.
localFirst.title: Local first, privacy first

pglite.desc: Built on PGlite, natively supports AI Native advanced features (vector search)
pglite.title: Next-generation client storage architecture

init.desc: Initializing the database, which may take 5 to 30 seconds depending on network conditions.
init.title: Initializing PGlite Database

modal.title: Enable Client Database

backup.desc: Export key data from the current database
backup.exportDesc: The exported data will be saved in JSON format, which can be used for future recovery or analysis.

reset.alertDesc: The following actions may result in data loss. Please ensure you have backed up important data before proceeding.

confirm.desc: This action will delete all data and cannot be undone. Do you confirm to continue?
confirm.title: Confirm Database Reset

reset.desc: Reset the database in case of irreversible migration
reset.title: Database Reset

backup.title: Data Backup

sql.desc: Execute custom SQL statements to fix database issues
sql.title: SQL Executor

exportType.all: Export Global Settings and All Assistant Data

feedback.desc: Every idea and suggestion from you is precious to us. We can't wait to hear your thoughts! Feel free to contact us to provide feedback on product features and user experience, helping us make LobeChat even better.
feedback.title: Share Your Valuable Feedback on GitHub

star.desc: If you love our product and want to support us, could you go to GitHub and give us a star? This small gesture means a lot to us and motivates us to continue providing you with great experiences.
star.title: Star Us on GitHub

error.desc: Sorry, an error occurred during the data import process. Please try importing again, or <1>submit a request</1>, and we will help you troubleshoot the issue as soon as possible.
error.title: Data Import Failed

finish.subTitle: Data imported successfully, took {{duration}} seconds. Import details are as follows:
finish.title: Data import completed

uploading.desc: The current file is large, and is being uploaded...

importPreview.title: Data Import Preview
importPreview.totalRecords: A total of {{count}} records will be imported

disabled.desc: Current session data is only stored in this browser. If you need to sync data across multiple devices, please configure and enable cloud sync.
disabled.title: Data Sync Disabled

unconnected.tip: Signaling server connection failed, and peer-to-peer communication channel cannot be established. Please check the network and try again.

telemetry.desc: We would like to anonymously collect usage information to help us improve LobeChat and provide you with a better product experience. You can disable this at any time in Settings - About.
telemetry.title: Help LobeChat be better

userPanel.moveGuide: The settings button has been moved here
